title: In an AI-first world, the future of cyber security is its workforce
description: The cyber security industry will experience immense change due to AI by 2030, so both employers and professionals need to grasp the nettle, and quickly, if they are to have the right skills and experience in place to succeed
content: The future of cyber security will not only be largely unrecognisable when compared with today, believes David Foote, chief analyst and research partner at Foote Partners LLC, it will also be messy an… [+9850 chars]
